Title: Establishes the empire state inclusive value ledger establishment and administration act
Summary: Establishes the empire state inclusive value ledger establishment and administration act to create a master account and system of individual wallets to make and receive payments to state entities and residents of the state.
LawCode: Add ยง4-b, St Fin L; amd ยง301, Fin Serv L; amd ยง5, UDC Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, the financial services law and the New York state urban development corporation act, in relation to establishing the empire state inclusive value ledger establishment and administration act
